mapper.insert: INSERT INTO faq(num, memberId, subject, content, faqsort) VALUES(faq_seq.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{faqsort})
mapper.update: UPDATE faq SET subject = #{subject}, content = #{content}, faqsort = #{faqsort} WHERE num = #{num}
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rnum, tb.* FROM( SELECT num, f.memberId, subject, content, faqsort FROM faq f JOIN member1 m ON f.memberId = m.memberId WHERE faqsort = 2 ORDER BY num DESC
) tb WHERE ROWNUM <= 10 ) WHERE rnum >= 1
SELECT NVL (count(*),0) FROM faq f JOIN member1 m ON f.memberId=m.memberId
